meanings.definition: To keep oneself occupied with tasks or activities.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys busying herself with painting and drawing.
meanings.sent2: He is always busying himself with gardening on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat was busying itself with chasing a butterfly around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The children busying themselves with building sandcastles on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The chef was busying himself in the kitchen, preparing a delicious meal for the guests.

meanings.definition: To make someone or something busy or occupied.
meanings.sent1: The teacher busying the students with an engaging science experiment.
meanings.sent2: The construction noise busying the neighborhood streets.
meanings.sent3: The magician busying the audience with his mesmerizing tricks.
meanings.sent4: The rain busying the windshield wipers as the car drove through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The bees busying themselves with collecting nectar from the flowers in the garden.
